newsitem.title: SWEDEN: P&U to show Detrusitol phase III data this weekend.
newsitem.headline: P&U to show Detrusitol phase III data this weekend.

text.p: Swedish-U.S. drugs company Pharmacia & Upjohn said on Friday it will present material from a phase III study of its anti-urine incontinence drug Detrusitol at a U.S. congress this weekend.
"This is an urologist congress in New Orleans and Detrusitol will be part of the scientific material," Pharmacia & Upjohn spokesman Soren Densjo told Reuters.
Reuters sources said the presentation will be done by scientists and doctors, not by the company.
Pharmacia & Upjohn has applied for approval of Detrusitol in Sweden, but has not released any results from the phase III study since December.
The company has discussed a fast track treatment with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
"We are waiting for FDA's answer to this question," Densjo said.
